articles.author: Eric Berger
articles.title: NASA may alter Artemis III to have Starship and Orion dock in low-Earth orbit - Ars Technica
articles.description: If it were to happen, a revised Artemis III mission could echo Apollo 9.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ This image taken by NASA's Orion spacecraft shows its view just before the vehicle flew behind the Moon in 2022.

articles.author: Jessie Wu
articles.title: Huawei launches Pura 70 series equipped with Kirin 9010 chip · TechNode - TechNode
articles.description: On Thursday, Huawei unveiled a letter on the Chinese X-like social media platform Weibo to announce the Pura 70 Series Pioneer Program, a scheme for people to purchase devices from its latest mobile phone series without holding a launch event.
articles.content:
Every Wednesday and Friday, TechNodes Briefing newsletter delivers a roundup of the most important news in China tech, straight to your inbox.
